headline: US Stock Market Wipes Out Over $5 Trillion on Trump’s Tariff War
summary: (Bloomberg) -- The S&P 500 Index declined to the lowest level in 11 months, slashing $5.4 trillion in market value in just two sessions as Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said the Trump administration’s tariffs “could have a persistent impact on inflation.”Most Read from BloombergHousing Agency Aims to Relocate Its DC HeadquartersLocal Governments Vie for Fired Federal WorkersMetro-North Is Faster Than Acela on NYC-New Haven Route After Signal UpdatesWhat Would ‘Transportation Abundance’
